title: Athentech Perfectly Clear Complete for Photoshop & Lightroom

Plug-Ins 2.0 give you a Perfectly Clear advantage. We made the worldâ€™s most advanced automatic photo correction 2x faster than previous versions, and added comprehensive enhancements to help you spend less time editing and more time out on shoots. Plus, weâ€™ve lowered our prices to make Perfectly Clear even more affordable for photographers at every level.

Main Features:
- Next generation Beautify â€“ gives you 10 ways to look your best.
- Faster â€“ re-engineered algorithms deliver at nearly 2x the speed.
- Our most powerful auto correction yet â€“ new algorithms bring out more details in shadows and highlights, and improve skin tones.
- New noise engine removes noise even more accurately and effectively.

Now included with Plug-ins 2.0: Beautify.
10 ways to look your best.
For the first time ever, our upgraded software includes one of the most popular features of our mobile app: Beautify. Yet weâ€™ve gone even further. This next generation of Beautify is a robust, automatic correction thatâ€™s unlike anything else on the market today.

1. Perfectly Smooth reduces wrinkles and smooths skin for a flawless complexion.
2. Blemish Removal eliminates pimples, blemishes, and other imperfections.
3. Shine Removal reduces excessive shininess of oily skin, providing flawless skin generally attained by using foundation or powder.
4. Skin Tone removes excess infrared captured by cameras.
5. Eye Enhance brightens and brings out the details in your eyes.
6. Eye Enlarge makes eyes larger and more expressive.
7. Dark Circle Removal reduces dark eye circles that appear underneath the eyes because of fatigue or unflattering light.
8. Catchlight adds sparkle to the eyes.
9. Teeth Whitening whitens teeth for the perfect smile and saves a painful trip to the dentist.
10. Face Slimming tones face shape for a more slender and youthful appearance.

System Requirements:

Windows:
- Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8 or 10 (32-bit and 64-bit compatible)
- Photoshop CS3, CS4, CS5, CS6 or Creative Cloud (supports both 32 bit and 64 bit)
- Photoshop Elements 8,9,10,11,12,13
- Corel PaintShop Pro X5, X6, X7, X8
- Lightroom 2.7 or newer, including CC
- 4 GB RAM or more
- Screen resolution: 1024 x 768 or more
